name: nn0expcld
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cn0), wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cn0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cn0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cn0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cn0))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cn0), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cn0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, cexp, c1), cn0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cn0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cn0))

comment: Closure of exponentiation of nonnegative integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
